ygData.subject: Re: How many training points to use
ygData.msgSnippet: I was 8th level when I trained in Freeport and was able to use 25 points without paying and then I paid less then 5gp to train an additional 5 points for a
ygData.messageBody:
I was 8th level when I trained in Freeport and was able to use 25 points
without paying and then I paid less then 5gp to train an additional 5
points for a total of 30. Now I just leveled to 9th last night and plan
on going to Freeport to see if I can train another 5 points in
Jewelcraft. I'll let the list know what happens.

In UO some NPC's could train you higher then others. Maybe the same
applies here in EQ? I have a high INT as well, maybe that effects
things?








-----Original Message-----
From: Shawn Alley [mailto:ShawnA@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 2:05 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: How many training points to use


From: Shawn Alley <ShawnA@...>

oh I got a message at 21 that I had to learn further advances. What
level are you?

If you can buy points DO IT. It is sooo cheap. Even at 1 plat per
point that's less than a failure with medium gems. It cost me 1s3c to
go from 20 to 21.

Azara
level 6 high elf enchantress

-----Original Message-----
From: Miko, Jeff [mailto:JMiko@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 5:47 AM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: How many training points to use


From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>

I was able to put 30 points into Jewelcraft! I had to pay some coin for
the last 5, but it was minimal.

I trained in Freeport and I'm a High Elf.


-----Original Message-----
From: David Long [mailto:dplong@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 5:54 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: How many training points to use


From: "David Long" <dplong@...>

you wont be able to put all of those points in . at a point ( think it
maybe 20) it says you must learn advanced trades skills in the field =
go out and do it , so i would suggest spending the max you can because
it will save you plat in trying .

Aaelar of the Teir'Dal

>>> "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...> 04/19 4:26 PM >>>
From: "Miko, Jeff" <JMiko@...>

I'm an 8th High Elf Enchanter and I have yet to use the Jewelcraft
skill. I have 33 training points saved up and was thinking about putting
them on in it. Any comments or suggestions?

Thanks
